item.title: They finished construction work, partly
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: It seems they finished construction work on I680, though partly – the highway between Washington and Mission Blvd., it becomes 5 lanes now. It seems Californian still has money to build I680, the construction work didn’t get any impact from this economy crisis, good to know. I wish things can be better day by day.
item.content:encoded:
It seems they finished construction work on I680, though partly – the highway between Washington and Mission Blvd., it becomes 5 lanes now.

It seems Californian still has money to build I680, the construction work didn’t get any impact from this economy crisis, good to know.

I wish things can be better day by day.

item.title: Construction work everywhere
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: It seems to me all major freeways in Bay area are having some kind of construction work, 101, 280, 580, 680, 880. I hit this problem as last night I was driving from San Francisco to Pleasanton, and finally the real route I took was driving down to south bay and then driving north, ridiclous.
item.content:encoded:
It seems to me all major freeways in Bay area are having some kind of construction work, 101, 280, 580, 680, 880.

I hit this problem as last night I was driving from San Francisco to Pleasanton, and finally the real route I took was driving down to south bay and then driving north, ridiclous.
